// HTML Template Generator for Purchase Order Form // This file contains the logic to generate HTML from React state export function generateHTMLMirror(companyFields, purchaseOrderFields, vendorFields, shipToFields, sectionOrder) { // Find where the title field is located (it could be in either section after swapping) const titleFieldInCompany = companyFields.find(field => field.isTitle); const titleFieldInPO = purchaseOrderFields.find(field => field.isTitle); const titleField = titleFieldInCompany || titleFieldInPO; // Determine which column should show the title and which should show regular fields const leftColumnHasTitle = !!titleFieldInCompany; const rightColumnHasTitle = !!titleFieldInPO; // Get fields for left and right columns (excluding title from both) const leftColumnFields = companyFields.filter(field => !field.isTitle); const rightColumnFields = purchaseOrderFields.filter(field => !field.isTitle); return `
${leftColumnHasTitle ? ` ` : ''}
${(titleField === null || titleField === void 0 ? void 0 : titleField.label) || 'Purchase Order'}
${leftColumnFields.map(field => `
${field.label}
`).join('')}
${rightColumnHasTitle ? ` ` : ''}
${(titleField === null || titleField === void 0 ? void 0 : titleField.label) || 'Purchase Order'}
${rightColumnFields.map(field => `
${field.label}
`).join('')}
VENDOR
${vendorFields.map(field => `
${field.label}
`).join('')}
SHIP TO
${shipToFields.map(field => `
${field.label}
`).join('')}
REQUISITIONER SHIP VIA F.O.B. SHIPPING TERMS
${[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map(row => ` `).join('')}
Item# Description Qty Rate Amount
Comments or Special Instructions
SUBTOTAL:
TAX:
SHIPPING:
OTHER:
TOTAL:
Contact Information:
`; } // XML Template Generator for NetSuite export function generateXMLTemplate(companyFields, purchaseOrderFields, vendorFields, shipToFields, sectionOrder) { // Find where the title field is located (it could be in either section after swapping) const titleFieldInCompany = companyFields.find(field => field.isTitle); const titleFieldInPO = purchaseOrderFields.find(field => field.isTitle); const titleField = titleFieldInCompany || titleFieldInPO; // Determine which column should show the title and which should show regular fields const leftColumnHasTitle = !!titleFieldInCompany; const rightColumnHasTitle = !!titleFieldInPO; // Get fields for left and right columns (excluding title from both) const leftColumnFields = companyFields.filter(field => !field.isTitle); const rightColumnFields = purchaseOrderFields.filter(field => !field.isTitle); return ` <#if .locale == "zh_CN"> <#elseif .locale == "zh_TW"> <#elseif .locale == "ja_JP"> <#elseif .locale == "ko_KR"> <#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
<#if companyInformation.logoUrl?length != 0> <@filecabinet nstype="image" style="float: left; margin: 7px" src="\${companyInformation.logoUrl}" /> \${companyInformation.companyName}
\${companyInformation.addressText} 		\${record@title}
#\${record.tranid}
\${record.trandate}
of
<#if leftColumnHasTitle>
<#if titleField?? && titleField.label??>\${titleField.label}<#else>Purchase Order
<#list leftColumnFields as field>
\${field.label}
<#if rightColumnHasTitle>
<#if titleField?? && titleField.label??>\${titleField.label}<#else>Purchase Order
<#list rightColumnFields as field>
\${field.label} <#if field.value?? && field.value?length gt 0>\${field.value}<#else>\${field.placeholder}
VENDOR
<#list vendorFields as field>
\${field.label} <#if field.value?? && field.value?length gt 0>\${field.value}<#else>\${field.placeholder}
SHIP TO
<#list shipToFields as field>
\${field.label} <#if field.value?? && field.value?length gt 0>\${field.value}<#else>\${field.placeholder}
REQUISITIONER SHIP VIA F.O.B. SHIPPING TERMS
<#list [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] as row>
Item# Description Qty Rate Amount
Comments or Special Instructions
SUBTOTAL:
TAX:
SHIPPING:
OTHER:
TOTAL:
Contact Information:
`; }

// HTML Template Generator for Purchase Order Form // This file contains the logic to generate HTML from React state export function generateHTMLMirror(companyFields, purchaseOrderFields, vendorFields, shipToFields, sectionOrder) { // Find where the title field is located (it could be in either section after swapping) const titleFieldInCompany = companyFields.find(field => field.isTitle); const titleFieldInPO = purchaseOrderFields.find(field => field.isTitle); const titleField = titleFieldInCompany || titleFieldInPO; // Determine which column should show the title and which should show regular fields const leftColumnHasTitle = !!titleFieldInCompany; const rightColumnHasTitle = !!titleFieldInPO; // Get fields for left and right columns (excluding title from both) const leftColumnFields = companyFields.filter(field => !field.isTitle); const rightColumnFields = purchaseOrderFields.filter(field => !field.isTitle); return `
${leftColumnHasTitle ? ` ` : ''}
${titleField?.label || 'Purchase Order'}
${leftColumnFields.map(field => `
${field.label}
`).join('')}
${rightColumnHasTitle ? ` ` : ''}
${titleField?.label || 'Purchase Order'}
${rightColumnFields.map(field => `
${field.label}
`).join('')}
VENDOR
${vendorFields.map(field => `
${field.label}
`).join('')}
SHIP TO
${shipToFields.map(field => `
${field.label}
`).join('')}
REQUISITIONER SHIP VIA F.O.B. SHIPPING TERMS
${[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map(row => ` `).join('')}
Item# Description Qty Rate Amount
Comments or Special Instructions
SUBTOTAL:
TAX:
SHIPPING:
OTHER:
TOTAL:
Contact Information:
`; } // XML Template Generator for NetSuite export function generateXMLTemplate(companyFields, purchaseOrderFields, vendorFields, shipToFields, sectionOrder) { // Find where the title field is located (it could be in either section after swapping) const titleFieldInCompany = companyFields.find(field => field.isTitle); const titleFieldInPO = purchaseOrderFields.find(field => field.isTitle); const titleField = titleFieldInCompany || titleFieldInPO; // Determine which column should show the title and which should show regular fields const leftColumnHasTitle = !!titleFieldInCompany; const rightColumnHasTitle = !!titleFieldInPO; // Get fields for left and right columns (excluding title from both) const leftColumnFields = companyFields.filter(field => !field.isTitle); const rightColumnFields = purchaseOrderFields.filter(field => !field.isTitle); return ` <#if .locale == "zh_CN"> <#elseif .locale == "zh_TW"> <#elseif .locale == "ja_JP"> <#elseif .locale == "ko_KR"> <#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
<#if companyInformation.logoUrl?length != 0> <@filecabinet nstype="image" style="float: left; margin: 7px" src="\${companyInformation.logoUrl}" /> \${companyInformation.companyName}
\${companyInformation.addressText} 		\${record@title}
#\${record.tranid}
\${record.trandate}
of
<#if leftColumnHasTitle>
<#if titleField?? && titleField.label??>\${titleField.label}<#else>Purchase Order
<#list leftColumnFields as field>
\${field.label}
<#if rightColumnHasTitle>
<#if titleField?? && titleField.label??>\${titleField.label}<#else>Purchase Order
<#list rightColumnFields as field>
\${field.label} <#if field.value?? && field.value?length gt 0>\${field.value}<#else>\${field.placeholder}
VENDOR
<#list vendorFields as field>
\${field.label} <#if field.value?? && field.value?length gt 0>\${field.value}<#else>\${field.placeholder}
SHIP TO
<#list shipToFields as field>
\${field.label} <#if field.value?? && field.value?length gt 0>\${field.value}<#else>\${field.placeholder}
REQUISITIONER SHIP VIA F.O.B. SHIPPING TERMS
<#list [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] as row>
Item# Description Qty Rate Amount
Comments or Special Instructions
SUBTOTAL:
TAX:
SHIPPING:
OTHER:
TOTAL:
Contact Information:
`; }
